post:
Hi there!

We are glad to offer our limited low end dedicated servers to the community!

We have only a few servers of the following configuration:

- CPU: **AMD A8-7600 Radeon R7**
- Cores: **4c x 3.1Ghz**
- RAM: **16GB DDR3**
- Storage: **1TB SATA**
- Bandwidth: **100Mbps Unmetered**
- Datacenter Location: **Saint Petersburg, Russia**
- You can upgrade CPU to **AMD FX-8350 (8 cores x 4.0 GHz)** for only +$10/mo!
- Upgrades also available for Disk Space, IP Addresses, Bandwidth.

The price is only **$49 monthly**! You can also get up to 15% discount if you pay quarterly, semi-annually or annually!

**Order now:** https://secure.vstoike.ru/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=179

Learn more about our [infrastructure](https://vstoike.ru/en/infrastructure) and [network](https://vstoike.ru/en/network).

And as always we are happy to answer any questions)
